Data Scientist: Looking for a candidate with expertise in ML, Python, data visualization, and cloud. Responsibilities include developing predictive models, analyzing large datasets, and creating data-driven solutions. Requirements: 3+ years experience with Python, SQL, and machine learning frameworks.
Frontend Developer: Must be skilled in React, CSS, HTML, and responsive UI design. Responsibilities include building user interfaces, implementing design systems, and optimizing frontend performance. Experience with TypeScript and modern JavaScript frameworks required.
DevOps Engineer: Strong knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines. Responsibilities include infrastructure automation, deployment pipelines, and cloud resource management. Experience with Terraform and monitoring tools preferred.
Full Stack Developer: Proficiency in both frontend (React, JavaScript) and backend (Node.js, Python) technologies. Experience with database design, API development, and system architecture. Knowledge of cloud platforms and DevOps practices a plus.
Product Manager: Experienced in product lifecycle management, agile methodologies, and cross-functional team leadership. Strong analytical skills and customer-focused mindset. Technical background and experience with data-driven decision making preferred.
